title: How to Grow Great Potatoes at Your Place

tasks.task: Conducting a vegetables and fruit farming session
subtasks: Discussing experience in organic farming for 14-15 years
Mentioning teaching hundreds of people locally and through internet courses
Addressing the common fear of taking on new challenges like growing food
Recommending the book "How to Grow Healthy Potatoes" by Annette Wellsford
Highlighting the book's comprehensive coverage (planting timing, fertilizers, pest control)
Emphasizing the book's importance for growing potatoes as a staple crop
Encouraging readers to read the book for confidence in growing potatoes

tasks.task: Promoting the book "How to Grow Healthy Potatoes"
subtasks: Mentioning the book's title and author
Outlining the book's content areas (planting, fertilizers, pests)
Reinforcing the book's value for potato growing
Urging people to read the book, especially for staple crop needs
